question:
A linear model is developed for the relationship between the annual salary of finance professionals and years of experience, and the linear model is: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mover>
      <mi>y</mi>
      <mo stretchy="false">^<!-- ^ --></mo>
    </mover>
  </mrow>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mtext>55,000</mtext>
  <mo>+</mo>
  <mtext>1,000</mtext>
  <mi>x</mi>
  <mo>.</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\hat y = \text{55,000} + \text{1,000}x.</annotation></semantics></math> The correlation is determined to be significant. Predict the salary for a finance professional with 7 years of experience.
